text: UMesiyaunyanakaMariyamwayengeyontoyimbingaphandle kokuba nguMthunywa; baninzi ababengabaThunywa abalandulelayo eli hlabathi ngaphambili kunaye. Umama wakhe (uMaryam) wayenenyaniso. Bobabini babesitya ukutya. Khawukhangele indlela eSizicacisa ngayo iiVesi kubo; kodwa khawubone indlela abaphambuke baphuma ngayo (enyanisweni)
